name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless
image_prompt: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro wireless gaming headset, black, premium design with retractable microphone, comfortable cushions, base station
description: Premium wireless gaming headset with active noise cancellation and hot-swappable batteries. Features 360° Spatial Audio, dual wireless connectivity, and hi-fi audio drivers for competitive gaming.

reviews.review_text: Best gaming headset I have ever owned. ANC is incredible.
Hot-swap batteries mean never running out mid-game.
Pricey but audio quality justifies it for audiophiles.
